issue.title: [R] Error gracefully if DuckDB isn't installed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15673](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15673). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Right now, the function `to_duckdb()` doesn't check to confirm that DuckDB is available. The error message isn't the worst (it'll mention `duckdb::...` not being found) it would be nicer to specifically tell folks they need to install the duckdb package.
